title: [Confused] What is the mechanism of local test network?

body:
Hey @aitimate, 3 things: 

1 - It's a bit hard to understand your issue which is making it difficult to answer properly.
2 - This is not really related to Hardhat but rather related to OpenZeppelin so the issue should have been opened there.
3 - That being said, I'll help you out:

Firstly, I guess you know it but `getTransactionCount` returns `the number of transactions sent from this address` so it has nothing to do with the number of contract the given address has deployed.

Then, calling twice `deployProxy` with the same implementation will only [deploy another proxy contract](https://docs.openzeppelin.com/upgrades-plugins/1.x/faq#what-is-an-implementation-contract). So it's pretty normal that the second call to `deployProxy` deployed only one contract.

I hope that helps, if not, please clarify the issue you are facing.
